column5: Beautiful home in Spring, Texas. 20 minutes from Bush Airport, 15 minutes from the Woodlands and 30 minutes from downtown Houston. Our home is located in upscale gated community called Harmony.  Great for families with kids and entertaining friends. Includes a multi-stage media room, Pool table that converts into a ping pong table, a full-size trampoline and more.  Walking distance from spacious park with pool, splash pad, tennis courts, basketball court and kids playground. Come enjoy!
